text:
#IndiaFightCorona 

In a massive exercise, Mock Drill on #COVID19 #Vaccine administration held in all States/UTs at 286 sites across 125 districts with ~1,14,100 vaccinators trained & > 75 lakh beneficiaries registered on Co-WIN.

#Unite2FightCorona
